items.name: 24" Wide Vinyl Table Runner Full Color

short_description.html:
24" Wide Vinyl Table Runners

Our custom printed vinyl table runners are printed on waterproof matte low curl 15oz blockout vinyl. (this is not a full coverage table throw). The runner lays flat in the middle of the table and drapes down the front of the table and half way down the back of the table. This as great way to add branding to any event display with the worry of the table size, it can virtually be used on any table size.

Vinyl Material

  • 15oz Low Curl blockout Vinyl, matte finish
  • Waterproof allows for easy cleaning

Need it faster?

Normal production time is 2 business days; however, we know sometimes you need things quickly! We do offer rush shipping options.

To view current shipping speeds and rates add your Zip Stand to the cart, add your shipping state and zip code into the shipping calculator.

Design Specs for 24" Wide Vinyl Table Runners

Please make sure to remove all template lines from the print ready file before submitting the artwork.

Design layout should be at full size:

  • 24" Wide Table Runner PDF template: 25" wide x 74" tall

File types accepted:

  • PDF - Preferred file type
  • Jpeg
  • Png
  • Eps

Color profiles accepted:

  • CMYK
  • RGB
  • Mixed colors
  • Pantone Colors*

*Pantone Colors

  • Pantone colors can be used. Pantone colors are converted to a cmyk mix for printing so colors may vary.

Lenses/Transparencies

  • Should all be converted to an image before sending in.

Image resolution

  • Should be approx 150dpi at final size for best printing.

How to order with multiple files

For multi sign orders using different files, please follow the directions below to save.

  • Place your order for the total number of signs you want and bypass the upload file option

    • This will allow you to take the quantity discount on your order (even if they are different files) as well as make the shipping cost much lower.

  • Let us know how many of each file

    • Write the file name in the "comments" section of this page, or in the file upload page, along with the quantity of signs you want from that file.

  • After you place your order

    • Go to our "File Upload" tab located on the top of the home page.

    • There you can upload up to 6 files at a time, if you have more than 6 , simply send another set.

  • We connect your order and your files by the email you use on your order and the file upload

We contact all of our customers after their order is placed and double check everything with you before we print, so rest assured you are in good hands.

24" Wide Table Runner Options Explained

Production Time: Production time starts the next business day from approval

  • 4 Day Production
  • 3-Day Rush Production
  • 2-Day Rush Production
  • 1-Day Rush Production

Design Help

  • I will send in a print ready file: You will upload your own print ready file
  • Please set up my design: We will do a simple set up of your table throw which includes adding a color background and logo to your throw.
    • For more detailed designs we are not able to accommodate in house and we will refer you to a freelance graphic designer for more help.

Upload your File

  • Can upload your print ready file
  • Larger files, please use the file upload link at the top of the site any time after your order is placed.

Care & Use of the Table Runners

Our vinyl table runners are a great alternative to the fabric table runners because they are lower in price and easier to clean. The vinyl material is waterproof making it super simple to wipe down if something gets spilled on it. The material is also rollable making it easy to travel with.

Washing your vinyl table runner

  • You can wipe your vinyl table runner with mildly soapy water, don't use harsh cemicals because it could ruin the material and ink.

Uses of Table Runners

Table throws can add branding to any display, it's easy to travel with and simply throw it over any standard table top.

  • Tradeshows
  • Lectures and Presentations
  • Advertisement Displays
  • Media Events
  • Presentations
  • Book Signings

Placing your order online for the 24" Wide Vinyl Table Runner

  1. Design Help
    • I will send in a print ready file
    • Please set up my design

Do you have your own print ready file?

  • Upload the file with the upload button
  • If you have large or multiple files, use the "File Upload" link after the order is placed

Order is placed: We will email you an order confirmation and your customer representative will be in touch during normal business hours.

Here is the next Steps:

Email proof: Our graphics department will send you a proof via email

Proof Approval: All proofs will need to be approved by you before printing

Printing: Once approved the order will move to production where printing will start

Boxing: When printing is complete your order will be boxed up and prepared for shipping

Shipped: Your order will be picked up by FedEx at the end of the business day. We ship Monday - Friday, with the exception of holidays.

Tracking: When your order is scanned in by FedEx you will receive an email from us with the tracking and expected delivery date.

 

If you have any questions, we are available:

Monday - Friday, with the exception of holidays

8:30am - 5pm EST

800-319-8184

Setup

The table throws are very easy to use, simply throw them over a standard table. Adjust it to cover evenly on all sides of the table.

Once you are done using it, simply pull it off the table and fold it neatly. Store it away for the next time.

Common Questions

Can I order a custom size Table Runner?

Yes, please contact our knowledgeable representatives and they can assist you with a custom quote.

How many colors or details can I use in my artwork?

You can use any number of colors or any amount of detail in your artwork without incurring any additional fees. We print in full color and no matter how many colors or how detailed the artwork is, it won't affect the cost of the sign.

What color profile should I use in my artwork?

We accept CMYK, RGB, Mixed colors and Pantone colors. We use a 4-color process, and each color profile will be converted to meet the original coloring as closely as possible.

When will I get a proof?

Typically, you'll receive a proof via email from our graphics department within 1-2 hours of placing the order, if the order is placed during regular business hours of 8:30am - 5pm EST, Monday - Friday, with the exception of holidays. If you place your order during off hours/days, you'll receive a proof 1-2 hours from the time we re-open.

I don't have a print ready file or software to set up artwork, how can I get artwork set up?

We only offer simple set up for the table throws which typically inclues adding your logo and a background color. Unfortunately, we don't offer artwork set up in house beyond simple setup.

Good websites to find graphic designers are fiverr.com or 99designs.com. If you are not able to find a designer please contact us and we can refer you to freelance designers we work with offen.
